Text:
Isn't it like the 3rd release now ?
What happened ?
The audio was out of sync on the CTU copy. If you've got that one and you're using VLC, just go to Tools->Track Synchronization and set the "Advance of audio over video" to about 0.300
Thank you very much for your time and effort to share this with us.
Awesome this is much better than the out of sync CTU! Thank you!
